author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Coimbatore District Forest officials nabbed two persons after they were found in possession of a sand boa and trying to smuggle it for sale.

The two were found in Modampathy beat in Ayyampathy area, near Palakkad Road, on Saturday.

Team

A team led by Range Officer C. Dinesh Kumar nabbed the duo identified as Siva (37), son of Nagaraj of Trichy, and Vignesh (10), son of Nataraj of Modampathy area.

Fine

District Forest Officer C.H. Padma compounded the offence by levying a fine of Rs. one lakh on Siva, and Rs. 5,000 on Vignesh.

Sand boa was released into the Booluvampatti Reserve Forest.

Sand boa is in Schedule 4 of the Wildlife Protection Act.
title: Two held for possessing sand boa
